title: Morgan Stanley Profit Rises 9%; Bank joins peers in posting gains in investment banking but decline in trading revenue
text:
The bank earned record profit for the full year. Wealthy clients flocked to the bank for help managing their money, and the market for deals on Wall Street stayed hot.

Investment banking revenue grew 6% in the fourth quarter. Rivals Goldman Sachs Group Inc., JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Citigroup Inc. also reported gains in investment banking.

Stock and bond trading revenue fell 6% in the fourth quarter. Trading revenue also fell at Goldman, JPMorgan and Citigroup.

Morgan Stanley shares rose slightly in premarket trading.

Write to Charley Grant at charles.grant@wsj.com

Morgan Stanley Profit Rises 9%
